event.title: was founded by the Norman William FitzMartin (c.1155-1209) in about 1197

data.event: The town was founded by the Norman William FitzMartin (c.1155-1209) in about 1197.
Despite seizure from the native Welsh, it remained within the FitzMartin family until the death of William, the 2nd Lord Martin, who died without male heir in 1326.
